jed

Class Descriptive_Stats

  • java.lang.Object
    • jed.Descriptive_Stats

  • public class Descriptive_Stats
extends java.lang.Object
    JED class Descriptive_Stats: Computes descriptive stats for arrays of numbers.         public static double[] get_probabilities(double[] data,
                                         double mean,

        Returns a double array of probabilities given the data, its mean, and its standard deviation. This method assumes a normal distribution parameterized by mean and sigma.
